name: Benign Positional Vertigo
chief_complaint: I feel dizzy when I move my head, especially when lying down or turning over in bed.
prognosis: Excellent with proper treatment; symptoms often resolve within weeks but may recur.
description: Benign paroxysmal positional vertigo (BPPV) is caused by dislodged otoconia in the semicircular canals of the inner ear, leading to brief episodes of vertigo triggered by head movements.
